title:
We hope all of our friends at English In Dublin are having a spectacular start to their week!

We present...

attachments.displayName:
We hope all of our friends at English In Dublin are having a spectacular start to their week!

We present to you the word of the day. For all of our English students and those who want to learn English or study English.

spec·tac·u·lar
/spɛkˈtækjəlɚ/ adjective
[more spectacular; most spectacular] : causing wonder and admiration : very impressive
(see more: http://www.learnersdictionary.com/definition/spectacular)


#wordoftheday   #learnenglish   #english   #englishvocabulary
